title: Patch Notes
content: . Poor thing. Sweet Stone Features, the condition granted by the Boney and Stoney statue, is now applied to the owner even if they are not part of the party and are waiting at camp. The Sweet Stone Features condition no longer gets cleared by the Bless condition. These conditions still do not stack. Karlach now will correctly react to Wyll becoming the Blade of Frontiers. Knocking out Minsc a second time after failing to save him will no longer kill him. Wulbren will no longer comment on Toobin'
